column5: hey guys i have a brand new shimano calcutta 400 TE that i am currently using for musky. i am throwing big baits all season long and people are telling me i should get it serviced after each year of use. i have spoent a lot of money on it and want it to last me quite some time. i was wonderiung if anyone knows where i can get it serviced?(cleaned up, replace any broken parts etc. )  thanks
At Shimano in Peterborough...they are tops in servicing their reels...
you might want to add where you are located so people can give you a place close to home...
Shimano in Peterborough has always been good to me and my reels!
i am located in bolton but i wouldnt mind a nnice drive to peterborough
then go there as you can find a few spots to fish from shore as well.
